entry.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - Wish
entry.content:
Chaos;Child Drama CD - Wish




Skipping to a slightly more serious Drama CD, the sixth from the DVD/BD releases.

This one revolves around Serika. Triggered by a conversation with Sakuma, Serika wonders about her true desires - a wish of her own.

Major spoilers for Chaos;Child. I advise not reading until after completing the true route. There are some slight hints to Fools as well, so you may wish to read that first.

You can view the translation here.

- Minamisawa Senri

entry.title: Robotics;Notes DaSH Summary Document
entry.content:
Robotics;Notes DaSH Summary Document




The summary document includes the plot summary of all routes in Robotics;Notes DaSH, along with a route walkthrough.

Robotics;Notes DaSH continues on half a year after the events of Robotics;Notes. Having spent the previous months studying on the mainland, Kai returns to Tanegashima. On the same ferry rides a certain Super Hacker...

DaSH details the adventures of Daru and the returning Robotics;Notes cast. For the most part, the game is a fandisk and does not take itself too seriously. If you wish to skip such service, the reading order for the true route is provided.

You can view the document here.

- Minamisawa Senri

My thanks go out to Mouse (@5zzb) for giving me a Japanese transcript to work from.

entry.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - Far too late - slumbering Fools

link.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - Far too late - slumbering Fools

entry.content:
Chaos;Child Drama CD - Far too late - slumbering Fools




This is the big one. This Drama CD was part of the Playstation limited edition release.

The main character of this story is Mio. We travel into her past, to investigate the reason as to why she harbours a deep hatred for all Gigalomaniacs.

Major spoilers for the ending of Chaos;Child lie inside, along with minor Steins;Gate spoilers.

You can view the translation here.

- Minamisawa Senri

link.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - The Right-sider and a certain day off

entry.content:
Chaos;Child Drama CD - The Right-sider and a certain day off




Onto the first of the Drama CDs from the DVD/BD releases.

The story for today focuses on Nono - whilst out shopping with Nono and Yui, Takuru's powerful delusions take hold once more.

Note, I am using the artwork which corresponds to the character featured in the Drama CD, not the artwork that appeared with the Drama CD. They wanted main girl on the first release so everything got shifted back one.

You can view the translation here.

- Minamisawa Senri

entry.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - The narrow path off the beaten track

link.title: Chaos;Child Drama CD - The narrow path off the beaten track

entry.content:
Chaos;Child Drama CD - The narrow path off the beaten track

Time to start up translating Chaos;Child content once more. Here for you today is the script of the Comiket 91 Drama CD.

The story revolves around the Newspaper Club trip to a traditional Japanese inn, complete with onsen. Various activities may or may not occur, depending on the delusion you desire.

As I have limited video skills; for now it is just a script. I aim to try for one Drama CD each week, starting next on the BD/DVD bonuses.

You can view the translation here.

- Minamisawa Senri
